thread.section_title: TicTacArea.com opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre TicTacArea.com | tictacarea.com
thread.title: Chintan

author: Chintan
title: Chintan
text:
After much research and skepticism I had ordered my watch from TicTacArea.com. It wasn't like there aren't any negative reviews about the website which is why I was a bit apprehensive at first, yet I went I ahead with it. After the order Juan from TicTacArea was in constant touch with me all throughout, responding to every small query I had. Their tracking system was also very spot on. I received the package exactly in 20 days from Spain to India! I am very happy with the watch, there were no mishaps with my order at all. This is genuine review and this a genuine website. Go ahead and get that watch that's been stuck on your mind for a while.
P.S. : Do go through your country's custom laws for duties on inbound parcels. I ended up paying a duty amount for the watch but that was my fault for not having it checked out beforehand.
Regards,
Chintan
